DataElement.preferredName: Post Hematopoietic Cell Transplantation Therapeutic Procedure Type Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes the post hematopoietic cell transplant therapy administered.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Post Hematopoietic Cell Transplantation Therapeutic Procedure Type
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order._Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.)_The grafting of tissues from one individual to another or place to place within a single individual._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Post Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplantation Therapeutic Procedure
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Post; occuring after.:Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.):The grafting of tissues from one individual to another or place to place within a single individual.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.

Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.)
Transference of a tissue or organ within an individual, between individuals of the same species, or between individuals of different species.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

Property.preferredDefinition: A subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

Concepts.definition: Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A clinical study that is designed using a procedure in which one or more parties to the study [subject(s), investigator(s), monitor, or/and data analyst(s)] are kept unaware of the treatment assignment(s).

Concepts.definition: A clinical study that is designed using a procedure in which one or more parties to the study [subject(s), investigator(s), monitor, or/and data analyst(s)] are kept unaware of the treatment assignment(s).

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.  Such studies test new methods of screening, prevention, diagnosis, or treatment of a disease.  The study may be carried out in a clinic or other medical facility.  Also called a clinical study.

Concepts.definition: A type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.  Such studies test new methods of screening, prevention, diagnosis, or treatment of a disease.  The study may be carried out in a clinic or other medical facility.  Also called a clinical study.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 09-29-08: Changed the value meaning of the permissible "masked trial" to "blinded clinical study" (C70840 ). Increased the max length to 60. Deleted the minimum length - RA

ClassificationSchemes.longName: Artificial Neural Network Algorithm for BRIDG Mapping

AlternateNames.name: Post Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplantation Therapeutic Procedure Type Indicator

ReferenceDocuments.name: Was a particular post hematop
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was a particular post hematopoietic cell transplant therapy administered?

ReferenceDocuments.name: BRIDG mapping path for CDE:2775132
ReferenceDocuments.description: "PerformedSubstanceAdministration.negationIndicator  WHERE PerformedSubstanceAdministration > DefinedSubstanceAdministration > Drug > MaterialName.name = {specified therapy} AND DefinedSubstanceAdministration.name = ""Administer Collective Post-HCT Therapy"" AND DefinedProcedure [HCT infusion] > DefinedCompositionRelationship [1] > DefinedProcedure [overall HCT process] > DefinedCompositionRelationship [2] > DefinedProcedure [Administer Collective Post-HCT Therapy] AND DefinedCompositionRelationship.sequenceNumber [1] IS LESS THAN DefinedCompositionRelationship.sequenceNumber [2]"

DataElement.changeDescription: . 2021-2-23 ak OK to release per WZ. System generated def displayed as alt def.
